extensionDescription.message: Adds context menu item to download files to an automatically chosen subfolder inside your downloads directory. The destination is chosen based on the URL and a set of customizable rules.

rulesTablePatternColTitle.description: Title for the patterns column in rules table

rulesTableDirectoryColTitle.description: Title for the directory column in rules table

removeThisRule.description: Label of the remove this rule button

addRule.description: Label of the add rule button

ruleHints.message: 'Pattern' is a regular expression matching part of the URL, or simply a word appearing in it. 'Subfolder' is the name of a subfolder in your downloads directory, which must already exist. Rules are checked in order from top to bottom.
ruleHints.description: Rule creation hints above the rules table

contextMenuItemLabel.description: Label for our context menu item
